effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The warleader can teleport up to 3 squares between each strike.
A target restrained by this ability takes an extra 3 damage.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each non-minion target can make a free strike, then each target shifts up to 3 squares. A target who has cover or concealment at the end of this shift can attempt to hide at the end of the warleader's turn.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target must not have taken their turn this round. The target takes their turn immediately, and if they have P<2 they are bleeding and take a bane on strikes until the end of their turn.
At the end of each of their turns, the warleader can take 5 damage to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.
The warleader can attempt to hide at the end of each of their turns.
Abilities targeting the warleader that would take a bane from cover or concealment have a double bane instead.

items.name: You Will All Witness my Blade

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The warleader uses Wodeblade against each target and gains an edge on the power roll.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The warleader can use Wodeblade. Each target can then make a free strike.

items.name: Is It Now or Is It Then?
items.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target is invisible until the start of the next round. The warleader then uses Wodeblade.
